snippet: Technology has given clinicians new tools to diagnose symptoms, decide treatments and to share information, changing what it means to be a doctor or a patient.
abstract: Proliferation of gadgets, apps and Web-based information is providing doctors with host of new tools for diagnosing patients; advances have also created a generational divide between younger physicians who are at ease with the technology and older doctors who worry that it may lead to a loss of human connection.
lead_paragraph: Technology has given clinicians new tools to diagnose symptoms, decide treatments and to share information, changing what it means to be a doctor or a patient.

headline.seo: Redefining Medicine With Apps and iPads - The Digital Doctor
headline.main: Redefining Medicine With Apps and iPads
headline.print_headline: Redefining Medicine With Apps And iPads
